content: The third time to participate in the public comment network Wangwang meal activities. This store gives people a general feeling. The first time I eat hot pot, there will be so many staple foods on the table. Overall, this hot pot restaurant has nothing special, but the weight of each dish is quite sufficient, this must be sure! As for the price, because I don't know the menu, I don't know if I have a group purchase voucher for this store, which is equivalent to 30% off. The price should not be very high! Finally, I would like to thank the merchants for providing the King’s meal, wishing the business is booming and the financial resources are broadening.

Unexpectedly stunning, coconut chicken heat and fire, beauty and beauty, greatly satisfied the love of hot pot afraid of the Martians. It can be seen that the ingredients are fresh and you will never want to eat the crab sticks of the ordinary hot pot restaurant. The vegetables are very fresh, the boss said that it is Daxing has a vegetable garden; the claypot rice is also above normal level. The boss said that the mall can only use electric stoves and cannot use traditional methods. Finally, Amway looked at the boss, it turned out to be a Western chef, and I can see that there are people who have food requirements, and 10,000 praises! ! !

A little distance from the noisy 1844 Square, a unique world of heaven on the riverside, that is the wasabi home. The elegant arc-shaped building is surrounded by a fountain, and stands at the ear of the door. It is a sound of water, and the mood is instantly calm. The interior is filled with romantic literature and art because of the cherry blossoms, the phalaenopsis, the photo wall and the various bottles. The floor-to-ceiling glass windows let the afternoon sun slowly penetrate, surrounded by river views and ancient buildings on the curtains of the gauze. Strikingly, there are also tender green leaves that are placed at the back door for making kimchi, hanging over the three-layer shelf of afternoon tea. The beef and potato cakes are delicious and delicious. The potatoes are soft and the beef is fresh. Who says potatoes and beef are perfect? The salmon sashimi is fresh and thick, with no astringency. It is made with freshly ground wasabi, which is more pure and fragrant. The saury is not hard and not crisp. Japanese beef hot pot is rich in variety and balanced, beef is easy to chew in flakes, vegetables and eggs absorb meat more delicious and juicy. The pudding and ice cream presented after the meal are also acceptable.

Five-star rating. After noon, the interior is very bright after the new renovation. Each table is separated by a screen and has good privacy. It is suitable for business parties and private dinners. In addition to the normal dishes, the menu also has dozens of lunch packages, which are much more than the average daily meal package. I ordered a tuna sashimi and I had six thick slices of sashimi. The amount was completely beyond expectations, and the freshness was worthy of praise! The salt-burning herring is also large enough, the fire is just right, and the skin is still crisp when it comes up. There is fruit or coffee after the meal. The waiter has a very good attitude and is basically responsive. There is a 10% discount on the purchase during the trial period, and the experience is very satisfactory. I hope that the store will maintain the standard and have the opportunity to try other dishes in the evening market. In the end, there will be places to eat tuna.

Xxc dry pot company gives people too many surprises, a small two-story facade is very ingenious, the main creative dishes reveal the owner's love of cooking. In the movie "Evil Toxic", there is a line "The more the water is, the colder it is, the more warm the wine is." It seems that drinking can be warmed up by many people, so in the gradual cold autumn, many people choose to drink to warm up. In fact, this is not scientific. The reason why people feel fever after drinking is because under the action of alcohol, the blood vessels will swell and the blood circulation will accelerate. At this time, the heat dissipation of the person will accelerate, but the body temperature will decrease, if it feels warm at this time. Undressing will make it easy to catch a cold because of the cold. Therefore, drinking and heating is not advisable. At the same time, drinking alcohol itself destroys the liver, and it is also positively related to the risk of cancer. Drinking itself is not worthy of admiration. If you must drink alcohol, you need to remember the word "appropriate amount". In winter, the daily drinking amount is preferably below 50 grams. For white wine, it is best to control about 30 grams. Beer should not exceed 2 cans or 1 bottle. This Jin Million Roast Duck Restaurant is located on the roadside of Sidaokou. The transportation is convenient, the environment is good, the taste is authentic, Beijing people love to eat roast duck, but few people can tell the origin of Beijing roast duck in detail. Let me introduce you to everyone~ Originated from During the period of the Southern and Northern Dynasties in China, there were already ducks in the "Jie Zhen Lu". After Zhu Yuanzhang built the capital in Nanjing, in the early years of the Ming Dynasty, the people loved to eat the Nanjing plate duck, and the emperor also loved to eat it. According to the description, the ancestor Zhu Yuanzhang was "a eclipse roast duck." The royal chefs in the court tried to develop the new method of duck plaque to please the emperor, so they developed two kinds of fork barbecue duck and oven roast duck. After Zhu Xi moved to Beijing, he also took away a lot of masters of roast ducks in the Nanjing court. During the Jiajing period, the roast duck was passed from the court to the folk. The old “cheap shop” roast duck restaurant was opened in the city of Huzhou Hukou, which is also the first roast duck restaurant in Beijing. At that time, the name was called “Jinling Piece Duck”, and in the market of the old “cheap shop”, there was also a special line of small characters: Jinling Roast Duck. The fork barbecue duck is represented by “Gongjude”, while the roast duck is the most famous “cheap square”. Jinling roast duck is made from fertilized grass duck, and the net weight is about 2.5 kg. The Imperial Palace of the Ming Palace will use the rich and fleshy lake ducks of Nanjing to make dishes. In order to increase the flavor of the duck dish, the chef uses charcoal fire to bake. After the dish is cooked, the duck eats a mouthful of crispy, fat but not greasy. It is praised by the people, that is, it is named "roast duck" by the court.

Fuju Quanqi Mutton Old Shop is located near the McDonald's in Lotus. There are several hot pot restaurants nearby, and it seems that the scale effect has been formed. Fuju has been open for nearly 20 years and is one of the earliest northeastern copper hot pot restaurants in Xiamen. With its high-quality ingredients, authentic northeast flavor and honest business philosophy, the store is becoming more and more prosperous in the highly competitive hot pot market. Stable old customers, and constantly attract new customers, has established a good reputation. All along, I have a special preference for the Northeast Copper Hot Pot. I like the simplicity of the shape, the natural heating with charcoal, and the feeling of heavy cultural accumulation, as if I can touch the food inheritance of China for thousands of years. The bottom of the pot is a shabu-shabu. The spicy portion is very flavorful. It doesn't lose the Chuanpai hot pot. It's just right, it won't be too light or too heavy. The ingredients here are not cooked, so eat directly. Great. The other half is the bottom of the broth. In most of the northeast, the bottom of the pot is used. In the pot, some green onions, red dates, longan, and glutinous rice are simply placed to maintain the original taste of the ingredients. The seasoning is self-service and can be taken according to your own taste. Start serving, first eat some cold dishes, salad cucumber fresh and refreshing. Then there is the barbecue, the hot dish, the mutton kebab is fat and thin, the fragrant spray is very tasty, the roast beef ribs are full of chewy, spicy and delicious. Hand grabbing mutton, fresh and fat, delicious and juicy, there are three kinds of sauces that can be simmered, too delicious. The new tiger dish, which is a famous dish in the northeast, is a mixture of onions, parsley and potato chips, which is crispy and delicious. Next is the heavy-duty beef and mutton in the northeast copper hot pot. The mutton and beef of Fuju are from Mongolia and Xinjiang. The variety is excellent and the meat is first-class. Fine mutton rolls, special mutton rolls, fine beef, hand-cut fresh mutton, hand-cut fresh beef, hand-made beef balls, delicious fleshy meat, firm flesh, meaty taste and great taste. Other leeks are also very good, the cow veggies are crisp and refreshing, the yellow throat is white and thick, and the taste is very good. Harbin sausage, which is a famous product in the northeast, the meat is firm and delicate, the faint smoky flavor is delicious, and it is well-deserved. Duck blood elastic full blows can be broken. Vegetables are also essential, ordering cilantro, cabbage, kelp, vermicelli, spinach, taro, northeast sauerkraut, northeast oyster mushroom, corn, fried bean husk, northeast dried tofu, many vegetables are also very northeast, such as vermicelli It is a northeast noodles, very elastic, and it is not bad for a long time. Northeastern oyster mushrooms are specialties in the Northeast, nourishing and delicious. In addition to the hot pot, the store also has a lot of hot dishes with northeastern specialties. If you don't eat hot pot, it is also a good choice to taste authentic northeastern dishes.

It was not worthwhile to use the roll with friends, so I had a double meal. Location: On the 4th floor of Times Street, if you pass through the passage of Hall A, you have to continue to go inside, almost to the end. The environment; the combination of American industrial style and rock bar style is slightly better than the decoration style of similar restaurants. This is actually a shabu-shabu, but it is more curry-flavored. We want the three yellow chicken shabu-shabu, the bottom is spicy. The main meal of the shabu-shabu table is also very fast, just ten minutes is fine, unlike Huang Jihuang, what is modulated at the table, it is open on the open flow table and then put on the table. The weight of chicken is very good. The side dishes are similar to those of Huang Jihuang. There are also celery, carrots and garlic, which are all greasy. The chicken of the three yellow chickens is very tender, basically the bones are peeled off, and the spicy sauce is quite spicy. However, the more easily the shabu-shabu is to the back, the more spicy it can hold, the less prone to greasy, plus The taste of the self-service beverage sour plum soup is also very pure, just under the comprehensive. Just because the cooking time or the chicken itself is not enough time to marinate, the chicken seasoning is not uniform, and some chickens have no taste, but it does not affect the overall taste. Plus the amount is really a lot, the two of us did not finish eating. Overall, it is still good, the original price is a little expensive. The only thing that has opinions is that every day the waiter will dance in the middle of the stage in the store. At that time, the music can be described as noisy. The staff of the vegetarian restaurant is very enthusiastic. Under normal circumstances, more than 30 hot dishes are served every day. The oysters, noodles, cold dishes, soy milk, pumpkin juice or whole grains are also kept at around 30, which guarantees the total number of dishes for each meal. Not less than 60. The cost per person is 10 yuan. The Qingxin Vegetarian Restaurant advocates equality for everyone. When you come first and foremost, no matter who you are, including investors, you must queue up to buy tickets. Moreover, the museum focuses on promoting the fine traditional culture of China, paying attention to courtesy, not loudly, but also eliminating tobacco and alcohol and promoting a comprehensive healthy lifestyle. “Zero Food Waste” is a major feature of the museum. In order not to waste food, all employees will share the rest of the storage bowl after the end of the service, leaving no kitchen waste. Vegetarians are good for the health of the social family, saving resources and protecting the planet. Many people come to volunteer and work as waiters in person. Before the vegetarian diet was eaten by the old lady of the Buddha. Today, I found that more customers are middle-aged and office workers. It is said that the flow of people is stable now and there are many old customers. The second floor of the store advocates cherishing food, eating without words, and returning coupons on CDs! It’s great to have such a self-service vegetarian restaurant, and we young people actually like it! Vegetarianism is a trend. Young people are easy to accept. I believe that more friends will change their eating habits in the future and regard vegetarianism as a way of health.

Sesame or something, very praising ~ Tempura: Can't eat too much, just taste a small piece, but still not impressed with the mustard Octopus: the wine artifact! Drinking must be! Can eat for a long time! Alcoholic: Three girls did not drink sake, or drink alcohol, I ordered the ebony's brewed wine, less alcohol, added ice, sour and sweet, and drank two cups without pressure. ~ Summary: The quality of the food is great, the service is okay, it is currently the favorite izakaya in Chengdu, which will be eaten once every three, and 32 likes!
